pages.text: $(li)Minecarts are vehicles that runs on $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/rail)Rails$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can mount in a Minecart right clicking on it.

$(li)There are exists four variants of Minecarts:$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/chest_minecart)Minecart with Chest$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/furnace_minecart)Minecart with Furnace$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/tnt_minecart)Minecart with TNT$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/hopper_minecart)Minecart with Hopper$(/l)
